document.full_text: facebook has agreed to buy snaptu, an application developer for mobile devices that are less sophisticated than smartphones, as the world's largest internet social network focuses on expanding its mobile services.
document.title: facebook to buy mobile app developer snaptu
lines_and_colors: facebook has agreed to buy snaptu, an application developer for mobile devices that are less sophisticated than smartphones, as the world's largest internet social network focuses on expanding its mobile services.
